uncc2014watsonsim.research

Class KensNLPScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • uncc2014watsonsim.research.PassageScorer
      • uncc2014watsonsim.research.KensNLPScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scorer

    public class KensNLPScorer
extends PassageScorer
    Returns the ratio of the number of noun phrases from the question that are found in the passage vs. the total number of noun phrases in the passage. TODO: needs to be fine-tuned but does currently return a score in some cases

      • scorePassage

        public double scorePassage(Question q,
                  Answer a,
                  Passage p)
        Description copied from class: PassageScorer
        Default implementation for researching a passage. Does nothing by default. You don't need to override this if you don't use it.
        Overrides:
        scorePassage in class PassageScorer
        Parameters:
        q - Input Question, varies slowest
        a - Input Answer, varies medium
        p - Input Passage, varies fastest
